subheader1: LYOTECH LABS is an R&D company that works on the development of software and hardware products including mobile phones, tablets, laptops and smart watches.
service-desc1: Technical teams on standby around the clock.
service-desc2: Don't worry about your servers,  our technical team will take care of them.
service-desc3: Our products have undergone testing and received certification.
service-desc4: Our datacentres are ISO 27001-certified, PCI DDS3, GDPR Data Protection and Storage protected.
server-desc: Our Linux VPS solutions are designed to suit all of your needs, and scale up as your business grows. We guarantee a high performance and a range of distributions for the Linux VPS.
server-item1-header: Full Root Access in VPS Hosting
product-item1-desc: The L One is a unique smartphone: not only can you enjoy high-level features.
product-item2-desc: Smartwatch to stay connected always. Two screen options are available to match your personal style.
product-item3-desc: Versatile design with keyboard and touchscreen to fit  every occasion. To take with you everywhere.
product-item2-subheader1: Super-long Battery Life & Health Data Tracker
product-item2-carac1: Up to 3 days in Smart  Mode.
product-item2-carac2: Up to 45 days in Essential Mode.
product-item2-carac3: Track your physical and mental health with in-built LYO apps.
product-item2-carac4: Check real-time prices of LYO BTC, ETH, Altcoins on your watch.
